mission_statement.0: We strictly adhere to the principle of developing a working diagnosis, both accurate and truthful for each dental procedure.

mission_statement.1: We strive to develop our own skills to a point that treatment can be individualized.  Presented as a list of options to each patient in lieu of a pre-set treatment plan.

mission_statement.2: We expect each team member to deliver patient care to the utmost of their ability, with regularly consistent successful results with emphasis on quality in lieu of quantity.

mission_statement.3: We appreciate learning to be continual and to be a shared expression of genuine concern for the mutual development of skills.

mission_statement.4: In my practice of dentistry, I believe that I am responsible to give back to the local community at large and so giving is woven into the fabric of the practice itself.

mission_statement.5: There are several levels of giving:

subset.5.1: The most common is a reduced fee for services.
subset.5.2: The second is the delivery of free services with-in a single visit.
subset.5.3: The third is a free will offering of multiple to accomplish a goal.
subset.5.4: Fourth and on, a sacrificed level is the decision to treat the poor.

mission_statement.6: Fifth and on, an extended outreach level is the reception of a free clinic in Honduras, which we developed through the MAMA group.

mission_statement.7: Corporately, each member of this office contributes to these acts of giving as they efficiently follow their job descriptions.
